title: Instagram app draining more battery even background is restricted
content:
Instagram app draining more battery even background is restricted i didn't used it for a second i tried every possible thing but still my issue is not resolved some pixel users also already reported this issue but i didn't find any solution for this
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/21737774/instagram-draining-lot-of-battery-even-when-background-activity-is-restricted-and-app-is-stopped?hl=en&msgid=21737774
